mapper.sql: id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, departure_province_id, departure_city_id, departure_area_id, destination_province_id, destination_city_id, destination_area_id, car_type_id, tyre_no, car_length, goods_type, goods_units, deliver_date, costs, remark, status, shipper_id, insurance_id, repeat_flag, use_type_id, length, width, height, handling_type_id, payment_type_id, auth_status, auth_date,order_no,company_id,weight
mapper.update: update t_order set data_status = ${@com.iflytransporter.common.enums.Status@Status_Invalid},update_date = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_order
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_date = now(),
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select b.id applyId,b.order_id as orderId,b.costs,b.transporter_id as transporterId,c.surname,c.`name`,c.mobile,c.create_date as registerDate,d.id companyId,d.`name` companyName,e.grade,f.count from t_order a left join t_order_apply b on a.id = b.order_id left JOIN t_user c on b.transporter_id = c.id left join t_company d on c.company_id = d.id left join (select transporter_id ,AVG(grade) as grade from t_comment GROUP BY transporter_id) e on b.transporter_id = e.transporter_id left join (select transporter_id ,count(1) as count from t_waybill GROUP BY transporter_id) f on b.transporter_id = f.transporter_id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.status = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}
